scripts.build:form-builder: ng build form-builder && cp ./README.md ./dist/@jaspero/form-builder && cp LICENSE ./dist/@jaspero/form-builder
scripts.build:page-builder: ng build page-builder && cp ./README.md ./dist/@jaspero/fb-page-builder && cp LICENSE ./dist/@jaspero/fb-page-builder
scripts.build:form-ui: ng build form-ui && cp ./README.md ./dist/@jaspero/fb-form-ui && cp LICENSE ./dist/@jaspero/fb-form-ui
scripts.build:tinymce: ng build tinymce && cp ./README.md ./dist/@jaspero/fb-tinymce && cp LICENSE ./dist/@jaspero/fb-tinymce
scripts.build:ref-table: ng build ref-table && cp ./README.md ./dist/@jaspero/fb-ref-table && cp LICENSE ./dist/@jaspero/fb-ref-table
scripts.build:monaco-editor: ng build monaco-editor && cp ./README.md ./dist/@jaspero/fb-monaco-editor && cp LICENSE ./dist/@jaspero/fb-monaco-editor
scripts.build: npm run build:form-builder && rm -rf node_modules/@jaspero/form-builder && cp -r dist/@jaspero/form-builder node_modules/@jaspero/form-builder && npm run build:page-builder && npm run build:tinymce && npm run build:form-ui && npm run build:ref-table && npm run build:monaco-editor
scripts.lint: ng lint form-builder && ng lint page-builder && ng lint monaco-editor && ng lint tinymce && ng lint form-ui
scripts.lint:fix: ng lint form-builder --fix && ng lint page-builder --fix && ng lint monaco-editor --fix && ng lint tinymce --fix && ng lint form-ui --fix
